title: Acer Predator XB273U V3bmiiprx 27" WQHD 2560 x 1440 Gaming Monitor | AMD FreeSync Premium | Agile-Splendor IPS 400 | Up to 180Hz Refresh Rate | Up to 0.5ms | Eyesafe 2.0 | Display Port & 2 x HDMI 2.0
description: Fasten your seatbelt: The Predator XB273U WQHD display with 2560 x 1440 resolution is all about no compromises on gaming performance, color or speed. This 27-inch (2560 x 1440) monitor combines jaw dropping specs including an Agile-Splendor IPS panel that supports up to blazing-fast 180Hz refresh rate. Through AMD FreeSync Premium technology, the game’s frame rate is determined by your graphics card, not the fixed refresh rate of the monitor, giving you a serious competitive edge. Smooth, tear-free gameplay!! And a whole lot more. (UM.HX2AA.302)
